website_summaries.verdict: This bill counter features a second LED monitor, so customers can watch and verify the counting process in real time.
pros: Processes both US and foreign currencies, including newer bills
Uses magnetic and UV sensing for counterfeits
cons: Bills need to be fed very carefully into machine
Fast operating speed can lead to jams and miscounts

customer_reviews.title: ONE MAJOR FLAW!
customer_reviews.text: Works ok except for one major flaw. When you load the bills in you have to be holding it at just the right angle or the machine will jam. I thought you could just put the bills in the intake area and let the machine do the counting. Not so. You have to be holding the bills just the right way and lower them just the right way or the machine will jam. Once you get the hang of it, it works fine. But if you're looking for a counter where you can just set the bills in and let the machine count them for you, this is NOT the machine for you.
customer_reviews.author: in808

customer_reviews.title: This machine is absolutely wonderful! This type of machine is way over priced ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine is absolutely wonderful! This type of machine is way over priced in the office stores, but like other reviewers have said, this machine doesn't miss a bill and is super accurate. I would HIGHLY recommend this unit, especially for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: What a little work horse... keeps counting and counting exactly as it should!
customer_reviews.text: I have used other brands (more expensive) but this counter is EXACTLY what I needed. It's never jammed or double counted a bill yet and makes my job so much easier. It's even caught a fake bill and if you've ever brought a counterfeit bill to a bank to be deposited you'll be VERY thankful this little machine caught it first.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rothschild

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't cost; it pays!
customer_reviews.text: Works great; dead-simple to use. This counter has already paid for itself and has saved my business from taking counterfeit $100 bills - twice!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt count money, counts how many bills you have
customer_reviews.text: i am so disappointed because this was a gift to my husband for his birthday which i bought couple months early, we barely opened it up and it doesn't count how much money you got - it counts how many bills you put in the slot. now since its been like 3 months i cant return it!!! not worth the $80 because it doesn't do what i wanted it to do which was count the money. i want to return!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't let you program increments of bills. Everything else works great, includes extra rollers as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Time saver - Great investment
customer_reviews.text: The bill counter is fast, easy, and a little fun lol. Nothing like the sound of bills running through the machine! The setup was super easy, and it doesnt get jammed very often. When it does, it is very easy to fix and continue. I cant tell you how much time this product has saved my business . I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kari JOnes

customer_reviews.title: This is a great machine. Counts fast and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. Counts fast and accurate. You can't beat it for the price. I wish I would have purchased this sooner. It cuts my money counting down by 90%. Like any machine there is always a glitch or 2, but when you learn how to work with it, its flawless. Took me about 5 minutes to get it right.
customer_reviews.author: TUT

customer_reviews.title: It has help me a lot
customer_reviews.text: After I receive this product it has made it easier to close my job at the end of the day
customer_reviews.author: gianny

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: works alot better than i thought it would for the price
customer_reviews.author: james j lesinski

customer_reviews.title: Too big/heavy
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure how it works: sent it back right away because of how heavy and bulky it was. I expected it to be more compact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for Euros, Rupees, Dollars. Very ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for Euros, Rupees, Dollars. Very reasonably priced. Hence bought one to present to my nephew in India. Just remember to buy the Simran voltage converter ($12) to use in India, My Nephew loves it !!
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Fast bill counter does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Counts bills very fast. Does have some trouble counting huge stacks of ones but if you use batch mode the count goes smoothly. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not count correctly, you always have to run it 3 times to get the right count
customer_reviews.author: Lighting Tech

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this machine works very well and saves a lot of time counting money
customer_reviews.author: Paul F Black

customer_reviews.title: No more triple counting by hand
customer_reviews.text: Neat little bill counter. I do financials for several conservation groups and this makes counting the cash much easier at the end of the evening. Why didn't I get one of these years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: We love it. Counts amazingly quick and accurate with many ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Counts amazingly quick and accurate with many “batch” options. My husband was impressed - and he is an Engenier :)
customer_reviews.author: Shani

customer_reviews.title: Great machine so far
customer_reviews.text: Great machine so far! I haven't used any of the features that detect counterfeit bills but it counts great and helped me so much at my recent sale!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Collins

customer_reviews.title: It works great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: It works great for the cost. It’s a bit finicky but once you get the hang of it its easy
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my nephew who loves to safe and count his money! machine works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Pink

customer_reviews.title: A person must load the bills & that's an aquired skill but easy to master with this "counter"
customer_reviews.text: Purchased another machine from Costco...worthless. all these machines are going to have problems somewhere. A person must load the bills & that's an aquired skill but easy to master with this "counter"
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so suprised and satisfied!!! Most because it was actually delivered on Christmas Eve so it was just in time!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it it jams most of the time big headache
customer_reviews.author: francisco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do -- counts money.
customer_reviews.author: T. Davies

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Working good. Sometimes notes are stuck in the flow. Count is perfect and detects fake notes.
customer_reviews.author: Satya

customer_reviews.title: Does job. But not constantly corrdct
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. I count large amount of cash daily. But spits cash out A lot. So constantly need re count. Also. At time if u have it off and turn it on it will glitch and delay for it to reset and start
customer_reviews.author: Asad. C

customer_reviews.title: Works great if I have perfectly crisp bills
customer_reviews.text: Too fast, it just spits bills in the air. Works great if I have perfectly crisp bills, but for retail operation money it not a good product. Fairly inaccurate most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: CBB

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Received in the mail and put it right to use so far no issues works well
customer_reviews.author: zack z.........

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product . Misscounts every single time . Don’t rely on this money counter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sensor failed , machine stopped working! Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Load Sensor stopped working, error code C-1. Machine is deemed useless now!
customer_reviews.author: magic

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Money....
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Would be more useful with adding machine function
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what we needed it for and that is counting money.
customer_reviews.author: boattrip

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was good and it works very good running fast
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was good and it works very good running fast. But a couple of issues I noticed. First the batch button is not much helpful because if you are to set batch to 20 or 5 or 4, you gotta hit - or + key so many time to reach the number you want. It should have been preset in such a way to give you 100, 50, 20, 5 and 0. Secondly the "add" key function strangely. If you hit add key, it automatically deletes currently count, resetting count to zero. I have no idea how to do addition when the machine set the existing count to zero.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Counts money quickly and accurately. High quality machine,
customer_reviews.author: Shawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy !!!!
customer_reviews.text: It Works great ..... its been over a month and I am very satisfied with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: ALI ASGHAR

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Makes things a lot faster at 3am
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Makes things a lot faster at 3am. I recommend it to any dealing with large sums of money and you can't trust the help.
customer_reviews.author: paul  josey

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ.
customer_reviews.text: I want to make this review because people have go to know what a workhorse this is. I don't baby this machine at all and it is beat to no end. I throw it in a gym bag in my hot car and it sits there for a week or more, I drop it, I rip the cords out, the machine gets slammed, etc. I hook it back in to count and BAM no more second guessing big counts and I stop wasting time. This is a great budget machine.
customer_reviews.author: Zorn Harbleen

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly fine for Venezuelan BsF currency
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly fine for Venezuelan BsF currency. The cost benefit relation is OK. We really enjoy counting money this way. Before this machine, we spent a lot of time, even hours, counting money, now, a few minutes to do it
customer_reviews.author: Jhon Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: So Satisfied,Great Product,Well Built,Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is great..came with extra backup parts and works like a charm...it is so WORTH THE MONEY...it will detect counterfeit bills instantly and already brought anger to my day once I realized after the store closed that my cashier let 150$ in counterfeit cash slide through..I didn't fire her but it won't happen again .don't know why I explained that much ,lol...you will be more then satisfied with this purchase, and to think I was considering the 200 dollar machines first...great product and fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Honest Man

customer_reviews.title: You pay what you get
customer_reviews.text: Price is too good to be true, built quality seems pretty ok, and it is extremely fast , picking up fake bills flawlessly. The biggest drawback is the acuruacy of counting. I do experience miss count for many times when stacking 50+ old bills. End up use it beside the counter as counterfeit bill detector (in my bar where light source is limited). I also don't like to place bill vertically instead of laying flat on the top of the counting machine. Not a bad buy for under $100.
customer_reviews.author: Dalum

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself some time!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to spend hours sorting and counting money. While I still have to sort, this little jewel save a tremendous amount of time each day. I always thought that a counter would be too expensive, but when I couldn't sleep one night I thought I would see how expensive they were. For the time that it has saved me, it has paid for itself many times over! I felt like I had done something wrong for the first few days because I was headed home an hour early!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good I will recommend it from here to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Kilo

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with new and old bills. But it does take some getting used to. As reported in other reviews it moves really fast and sometimes spits bills out. Love the batch feature.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little fast, need to get use to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate, buy one! So worth the time you will save, plus if it lasts yrs, your time counting money over time is worth a lot more than $70... One of my best purchases. My father had a small grocery store for 35 yrs, he was crazy for never buying one of these. There aren't any instructions on how to replace the parts that were included when they wear out, but I'll figure that out when and if that time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money.
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly with Brazilian Real bills. The only problem I have had so far was the counterfeit detection for R$2,00 bills (the smallest ones we have in Brazil) that detected all the bills as fakes. Maybe that happened because the bills are so small, compared to all the others, that they do not reach the counterfeit "detectors/mechanisms". But turning off both counterfeit detection modes the machine counts the bills precisely. Just hope it has a long lifespan!!
customer_reviews.author: ORLI CAMARGO JUNIOR

customer_reviews.title: Can do at least 250 bills at once. Doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Can do at least 250 bills at once. Doesn't sort denominations. Those machines are very expensive. Does what you want. Batch feature is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It is very bad product. Not even working for 6 monthes
customer_reviews.author: FIREHIWOT T GEBREHIWOT

customer_reviews.title: Makes mistakes almost every time. In straps of 100 ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes mistakes almost every time. In straps of 100 bills it will miscount by one or two bills about 9 out of ten times.
customer_reviews.author: George Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I like this machine. Easy to carry but there is weight not much.. This machine only count note not do total amount.
customer_reviews.author: M K

customer_reviews.title: Always want to know if they actually worked so bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Always want to know if they actually worked so bought it for pure entertainment and curiosity they actually do work and really well downfall is don't really need it guess was learning experience
customer_reviews.author: Curtis steahr

customer_reviews.title: Received broken machine, returned for refund
customer_reviews.text: The platform for the bill stacking was broken and loose causing the bills to go all over the place. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: John Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: which is great. My beef with this is the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine itself works as intended, which is great. My beef with this is the fact that rather than being sent in an amazon box, it was just tagged up on the actual products box. Now, this wouldn't be a problem if it wasn't just left on my door step. Just a recap, it was shown as exactly what it is, sitting out on my door step.
customer_reviews.author: Macahomie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not very accurate, had to run a twice most of the time to get an accurate count.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Shipping Fail
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tried the product yet, but be aware: This was shipped to me as is. How do you ship something like this without putting it in a box?!! I’m very pissed off. Do you really think anyone wants others to know you need one of these?!! Not too smart!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Goldgell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is OK if you want to count number of bills. Does not add dollar amount.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely terrible product. It counts the money too fast so ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible product. It counts the money too fast so it usually miscounts by 1 to 5 bills. Constantly jams unless I put the bills in JUST RIGHT. I really do not like it. Your better off spending $200 more than this piece of garbage and getting something that actually works. I swear the reviews on here are fake cause this thing sucks.
customer_reviews.author: I Buy Stuff

customer_reviews.title: PILE OF JUNK....
customer_reviews.text: JUNK didn't power up BNIB. Could not get it to work so returned!
customer_reviews.author: One Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: and not sure if it worked well for him
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for a neighbor when he requested and not sure if it worked well for him
customer_reviews.author: Lissy

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Fast, Fast, Fast. This machine is cool as heck for only $80. Flawless right out of the box..
customer_reviews.author: Jason Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT!! COUNTS AT LIGHTING SPEED.NO JAM... THERE IS NO DENOMINATION. BUT FOR 100 BUCKS ITS WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

product_meta.title: HFS Bill Money Counter Worldwide Currency Cash Counting Machine UV & MG Counterfeit
product_meta.description:
Whats Included: 
1 - Counter 
1 - LED External Display 
6 - Replacement Wheels 
1 - Cleaning Brush 
1 - Replacement Belt 
1 - Replacement 

Description: 
This bill counter will save valuable time at any business by eliminating the manual counting of multiple bills. At over 900 bills per minute, in most currencies, this machine will count bills with 100% accuracy. Also features UV and MG detection of fake bills or currency. This kit also includes a external display for customer or second party viewing when needed. 

No more counting for hours, ending up with counterfeit bills. Save the time and hassle with this automatic bill counter. 

Automatic detecting with UV(ultraviolet) and MG(magnetic) while counting 
Suitable for most currencies in the world 
Automatic start,stop and clearing 
With batching,adding and self-examination functions 
Double-notes detecting 
Automatic half-note detection 

SPECIFICATIONS: 
Counting Speed: ?1,000 pcs/min 
Size of Countable Note: 50mm×110mm/90mm×190 mm 
Dimensions: 292mm×246mm×178 mm 
Net Weight: 6.1kg 
Size of Carton: 420mm×320mm×540mm(2 pcs) 
Gross Weight: 15.2kg(2 pcs) 
Power Supply: AC 120V±10% 60Hz±5% 
Power Consumption: ?70 
Hopper Capacity: 300 pcs 
Stacker Capacity: 200pcs 

NOTE: This counter does not add bills or detect denomination. For example, putting a stack of 5 $10s and 5 $20s will read as "10" not $150.
feature_bullets: NOTE: This counter does not add bills or detect denomination. For example, putting a stack of 5 $10s and 5 $20s will read as "10" not $150. Counters that detect denomination cost $1,000+ from any seller.
Counts USD, EURO, and other funds Counts new 100 dollar bill
Dual Counterfeit Detection Sensors: Ultraviolet & Magnetic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars195 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
